channel.title: Electronics on c0nrad's c0rner
channel.description: Recent content in Electronics on c0nrad's c0rner

item.title: SWU Health Counter
item.description:
A new electronics project! It’s a simple circuit that just keeps track of base health for Star Wars Unlimited (SWU) trading card game. This was my first time making/ordering a PCB, and I learned a lot along the way.

Problem Statement

To keep track of your base health in SWU, people usually use little damage tokens (in increments of 1/3/5/10), or dice. But I don’t like these.

item.title: Thermoshat Pt. 3
item.description: Setting up a metrics endpoint for thermoshat.

item.title: Thermoshat Pt. 1
item.description: Introducing the thermoshat. A raspberry pi to adjust my manual thermostat with the added of thrill of increased fire danger.
